page.title: 15Wavin Building Products 2.
page.content: The factory has just two computers but these have about fifty terminals and are used for dealing with production, sales, distribution, accounts and management information. The production of the factory is taken in company lorries and trailers mainly to the South and the Midlands though some also goes to Northern England. The company is part of the Wavin Group that is the largest plastics processor in Europe, with companies also in Holland, Germany, France, Denmark and Ireland. They have one other factory in Great Britain, at Ashford, that makes similar products that are mainly larger than those made in Chippenham.
